objects.text: • Premium Double-Wall • No Condensation • Perfect For Smoothies

product_details.name: Double-Wall Glass Smoothie Cup - Perfect for Berry Bliss Paradise
product_details.description:
• Premium double-wall borosilicate glass construction for temperature retention
• Elegant transparent design showcasing your colorful beverages
• Thermal insulation keeps drinks cold longer while preventing condensation
• 300ml capacity - ideal for smoothies, yogurt parfaits, and desserts
• Modern minimalist aesthetics perfect for Instagram-worthy presentations
• Dishwasher safe and easy to clean
• Heat-resistant and durable for daily use
• No sweating on the outside - keeps your table dry
• Perfect gift for health enthusiasts and home baristas
• Versatile use for hot and cold beverages

banner_details:
This banner features a vibrant and modern promotional layout centered around a glass cup product. The background is a gradient radial blend transitioning from a rich violet to deep purple, giving a sense of depth and luxury. At the center, a white circular frame with accent strokes houses the main product image (`product_image`), a glass filled with yogurt and berries, appealingly presented. Above the product, the heading (`heading`) and subheading (`subheading`) introduce the product with bold, white typography. A circular price tag (`price`) overlays the right side, highlighted in a pink-gradient badge. Beneath, three bullet-point features (`description`) emphasize product benefits. A conspicuous call-to-action button (`cta_button` with `cta` text) in bright pink urges immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Gradient Background: #9C27B0 → #4A148C  
- Accent Pink: #E91E63 → #C2185B  
- White Highlights: #FFFFFF  
- Accent Strokes: #E91E63, #FFFFFF (dashed)  
- Typography: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image presents a vibrant and fresh color palette that can be effectively utilized in an advertisement banner. The focus is on rich berry tones and cool neutrals. Dominant colors include deep blackberry purple (#2E1A24), bright currant red (#B61C1C), and blueberry blue (#4E5A8A), set against the soft, creamy white (#F2F4EF) of the yogurt and the transparent glass. The berries' shiny textures enhance color depth, while the light highlights their roundness and juiciness. These bold colors contrast beautifully with the muted background to create a visually appealing balance. This palette evokes freshness, health, and natural sweetness—ideal for promoting a nutritious, fruity product.
